description: I have seen a lot of different places during those almost two years since I am doing this job. But today’s client lived in an basically empty apartment. Almost no furnitures. Totally depressing place. He moved in just recently and gathered a lot of debts doing so. Just standard things… unpaid mobile bills and rent, some debts with fiends and his ex-girlfriend was also involved. He didn’t even have a table where I could count both debts and money. So I thought it would be an easy game for me this time. But this boy seemed to have real problems with my offer. I always think that they should be more than happy to get such a second chance to start a new life without debts just for an hour of sex. But he finally agreed… just in the very moment I was about to leave.
title: Debt Dandy 101
